import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import gsap from "gsap"; import { motion } from "framer-motion" const Header = () => { useEffect(()=> { gsap.to('.hero__title span', { delay: 0.4, duration: 1.4, y: "0%", ease: 'power4.out', stagger: 0.1}) },[]) return (
ABOUT SHOP

NINE FIFTY STORE

) } export default Header
